author: Worker_Joe
title: A great Promotional set!
review:
I just picked up two of these and I love the NinjaGo sticker piece. Perfect for any NinjaGo fan who would like to start collecting! Also available at this event was a card that allowed you to get a free Flame Pit card [SP 100] with any purchase in January. They gave you a headband and a White Ninja Sticker too.
-I posted this picture for this set!
Worker Joe

author: Lego_Master_1955
title: I have it!
review: I got this set for free yesterday at toys R us.They shown some new sets of ningago that would come out.It is only for display and cannot be played with.it comes with a gold sword and was very easy to build.I'm not going to sell it.It's awsome!

author: J14T14
title: Great Way to Kick Things Off
review: This promotional set for the Ninjago line when it kicked off was a great way to start things off. The exclusive stickered piece is great to have and this set would look good in a LEGO® Ninjago display. It isn't much but it is a nice add on to anyones collection. One downside of this is that since the sword piece is curved, it bends a little when you clip it in, but it isn't too noticeable and it doesn't damage the piece. In conclusion, this is a good little promotional idem to promote the Ninjago line.
